name.japanese: セクシー・フォクシー号

keyEvents.title: Combat Round Arena
keyEvents.description: The Sexy Foxy serves as the arena for the final Combat round of the Davy Back Fight between Luffy and Foxy. The entire ship and everything within a 100-meter radius of the mast is designated as the battle area.
keyEvents.significance: Provides home-field advantage to Foxy, who knows all the ship's traps and mechanisms. The unique arena creates a distinctive battle environment filled with hazards.

description: The Sexy Foxy is the flagship of the Foxy Pirates, an enormous fox-themed galleon. The ship features a massive fox head at the bow that functions as an elevator, and an equally large tail (possibly the rudder) at the stern. Built to accommodate at least 500 crew members, the ship measures approximately 100 meters from stem to stern.
features: Fox head prow that works as an elevator
Massive fox tail at the stern
Multiple trap rooms including spike-floor rooms

reveals.information: The Sexy Foxy is filled with traps and mechanisms that Foxy uses to his advantage during battles, including spike rooms, trapdoors, and hidden weapons
